an8.20:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
an8.20:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava tadahuposathe bhikkhusanghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an8.20:1.3: Atha kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante pathame yame, utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.20:1.4: “abhikkanta, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pathamo yamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusangho.
an8.20:2.2: Dutiyampi kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante majjhime yame, utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.20:2.3: “abhikkanta, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto majjhimo yamo, ciranisinno bhikkhusangho.
an8.20:2.6: Tatiyampi kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante pacchime yame, uddhaste arune, nandimukhiya rattiya utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.20:2.7: “abhikkanta, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yamo, uddhastam arunam, nandimukhi ratti;
an8.20:3.2: “kam nu kho bhagava puggalam sandhaya evamaha:
an8.20:3.4: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano sabbavantam bhikkhusangham cetasa ceto paricca manasakasi.
an8.20:3.5: Addasa kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam puggalam dussilam papadhammam asucim sankassarasamacaram paticchannakammantam assamanam samanapatinnam abrahmacarim brahmacaripatinnam antoputim avassutam kasambujatam majjhe bhikkhusanghassa nisinnam;
an8.20:3.6: disvana utthayasana yena so puggalo tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam puggalam etadavoca:
an8.20:4.1: Evam vutte, so puggalo tunhi ahosi.
an8.20:4.2: Dutiyampi kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam puggalam etadavoca:
an8.20:4.5: Dutiyampi kho so puggalo tunhi ahosi.
an8.20:4.6: Tatiyampi kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam puggalam etadavoca:
an8.20:4.9: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tunhi ahosi.
an8.20:5.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam puggalam bahayam gahetva bahidvarakotthaka nikkhametva sucighatikam datva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.20:5.6: Yava baha gahanapi nama so moghapuriso agamissati”ti.
an8.20:6.2: “tumheva dani, bhikkhave, uposatham kareyyatha, patimokkham uddiseyyatha.
an8.20:6.3: Na danaham, bhikkhave, ajjatagge uposatham karissami, patimokkham uddisissami.
an8.20:6.4: Atthanametam, bhikkhave, anavakaso yam tathagato aparisuddhaya parisaya patimokkham uddiseyya.
an8.20:7.1: Atthime, bhikkhave, mahasamudde acchariya abbhuta dhamma, ye disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
an8.20:7.3: Mahasamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapono anupubbapabbharo, na ayatakeneva papato.
an8.20:7.4: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapono anupubbapabbharo, na ayatakeneva papato;
an8.20:7.5: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde pathamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti (yatha purime tatha vittharo.)
an8.20:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo mahatam bhutanam avaso. Tatrime bhuta—timi timingalo timirapingalo asura naga gandhabba. Vasanti mahasamudde yojanasatikapi attabhava …pe… pancayojanasatikapi attabhava.
an8.20:8.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo mahatam bhutanam avaso; tatrime bhuta—timi timingalo timirapingalo asura naga gandhabba; vasanti mahasamudde yojanasatikapi attabhava …pe… pancayojanasatikapi attabhava;
an8.20:8.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde atthamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
an8.20:8.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, mahasamudde attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
an8.20:9.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, attha imasmim dhammavinaye acchariya abbhuta dhamma, ye disva disva bhikkhu imasmim dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.20:9.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapono anupubbapabbharo, na ayatakeneva papato;
an8.20:9.4: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye anupubbasikkha anupubbakiriya anupubbapatipada, na ayatakeneva annapativedho.
an8.20:9.5: Yampi, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye anupubbasikkha anupubbakiriya anupubbapatipada, na ayatakeneva annapativedho;
an8.20:9.6: ayam, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye pathamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva bhikkhu imasmim dhammavinaye abhiramanti …pe…
an8.20:9.7: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo mahatam bhutanam avaso; tatrime bhuta—timi timingalo timirapingalo asura naga gandhabba, vasanti mahasamudde yojanasatikapi attabhava …pe… pancayojanasatikapi attabhava;
an8.20:9.8: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ayam dhammavinayo mahatam bhutanam avaso. Tatrime bhuta—sotapanno sotapattiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno …pe… araha arahattaya patipanno.
an8.20:9.9: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayam dhammavinayo mahatam bhutanam avaso; tatrime bhuta—sotapanno sotapattiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno …pe… araha arahattaya patipanno;
an8.20:9.10: ayam, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye atthamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva bhikkhu imasmim dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
an8.20:9.11: Ime kho, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma, ye disva disva bhikkhu imasmim dhammavinaye abhiramanti”ti.
